description: If you like your beer refreshing and&nbsp;alcoholic, then the Irish Ale cocktail is perfect for you. It has just enough carbonation to keep things interesting without being too bubbly or heavy on taste buds - plus lime wedges bring added freshness! For those who want more of an armful after one glass (we know how it goes), there's also ginger beer which can be drunk straight from its bottle if desired.
keywords: How to make Irish Ale cocktail
